name: android-usb-tester
description: Use to test android usb printer
author: Lo King Wei <kiwi198@gmail.com>

scripts.sign: rm usb-printer-tester.apk & jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore feedme.keystore -storetype JKS -storepass Qwer1234@ -keypass Qwer1234@ dist/cordova/android/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk app.feedmepos.com & zipalign -v 4 dist/cordova/android/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk usb-printer-tester.apk
